{"id":1268002975,"question_id":3451,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1716690946,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"18 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1268002975/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String Compression III","memory":"45.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String compressedString(String word) {\n        if(word.length() == 0)\n            return word;\n        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();\n        \n        char cur = word.charAt(0);\n        int count = 1;\n        for(int i=1; i<word.length();i++){\n            char ch = word.charAt(i);\n            \n            if(ch!=cur || (ch == cur && count==9)){\n                sb.append(count);\n                sb.append(cur);\n                cur = ch;\n                count = 1;\n            }else if(ch == cur){\n                count++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        sb.append(count);\n        sb.append(cur);\n        \n        return sb.toString();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-compression-iii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
